dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6813 IH: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the National Institutes of Health, to conduct a study on the neurological impacts of COVID–19 on individuals with a neurological disease.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Keating introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the National Institutes of Health, to conduct a study on the neurological impacts of COVID–19 on individuals with a neurological disease.

section.header: Study on the neurological impacts of COVID–19 on individuals with a neurological disease

subsection.text: The Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the National Institutes of Health, shall conduct a study on the neurological impacts of COVID–19 on individuals with a neurological disease.

Not later than 120 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Health and Human Services shall complete the study under subsection (a) and submit to the Congress a report on the results of such study.
